thread.section_title: Mosaic Weighted Blankets Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mosaic Weighted Blankets | mosaicweightedblankets.com
thread.title: Vian
thread.title_full: Mosaic Weighted Blankets reviewed by Vian

author: Vian
title: Vian
text: it took a bit of adjusting to the weight but now i think i've really adapted to it sometimes i can't feel the weight or it slips off my body but it's still a nice comfort to have a heavy mass near me, it kind of reminds me of when my dog used to sleep near my legs. My only issue is the sillicone beads are really loud when you shift under the blanket, kinda sucks when you're about to fall asleep. But the cloth is very soft and the weight is nice and comforting, I'd definitely recommend if the beads were less loud
